          <div id="wb-layout-main">
           <div id="wb-layout-main-inner-1">
            <div class="wb_region wb-text-content" id="wb-layout-main-inner-2">
             <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="" id="wb_cl__12346786" width="100%">
              <tr>
               <td>
                <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="wb_con" id="wb_con__1231925678" width="100%">
                 <tr>
                  <td class="wb_col" id="wb_col__332367856" style="" valign="top" width="100%">
                   <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_text__523455267" width="100%">
                    <tr>
                     <td align="left">
                      <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_text__523455267">
                       <div>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; width: auto;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; color: #333399; font-size: xx-large;">
                          <span face="dancing script, arial, sans-serif" size="5" style="font-family: 'dancing script', arial, sans-serif;">
                           <b>
                            Welcome to Gingham!
                           </b>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; width: auto;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif; width: auto; background-color: #ffffff;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; width: auto; text-align: justify;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif; width: auto; background-color: #ffffff;">
                          Located in Chatham, NJ, we are a non-profit school for children ages 2 - 6. Now in our twenty-seventh year, Gingham continues to grow due to our multi-faceted approach to education. We boast a fantastic student-teacher ratio, a director certified in special education, and a facility made up of beautiful and spacious classrooms, a private, shaded playground and full sized gymnasium.
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; width: auto;">
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: verdana, arial, sans-serif; width: auto;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif; font-size: large;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; width: auto; text-align: justify;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="width: auto; background-color: #ffffff;">
                          <span face="dancing script, arial, sans-serif" size="5" style="font-family: 'dancing script', arial, sans-serif; font-size: xx-large; color: #333399;">
                           <b>
                            Our Mission
                           </b>
                          </span>
                          <br/>
                          <br/>
                          <span face="arial, verdana, sans-serif" style="font-weight: normal; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif;">
                           Our primary goal is to ensure that each child develops confidence in his/her abilities. Positive self-esteem enables children to
                          </span>
                          <span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif; width: auto;">
                           explore
                          </span>
                          <span face="arial, verdana, sans-serif" style="font-weight: normal; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif;">
                           and experiment. With guidance, encouragement and lots of praise, a strong link to learning will result.
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="color: #000000; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none; width: auto; text-align: justify;">
                         <span face="comic sans ms, cursive" size="4" style="width: auto; background-color: #ffffff;">
                          <span face="arial, verdana, sans-serif" style="font-weight: normal; font-size: large; font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif;">
                           <br/>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="width: auto; text-align: justify;">
                         <span face="arial, verdana, sans-serif" size="4" style="font-family: arial, verdana, sans-serif; font-size: large; color: #000000;">
                          <span style="background-color: #ffffff;">
                           We continue to evolve our programs to meet the growing needs of parents and children. Whether you need an early drop off due to your work schedule, or an after school activity for your active child, Gingham works to ensure each student's needs are met and parental expectations are exceeded.
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </p>
                        <p align="left" style="width: auto; text-align: center;">
                         <br/>
                        </p>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </td>
                    </tr>
                   </table>

                           234 Southern Boulevard

                        </p>
